resource.chars:
With regard to the experiment 
which is going on with 
the platinum guard, which 
I had the honour to suggest 
to the Society, its progress 
is such as I anticipated.
A comparison has lately 
been made of my Barometer,
to which this contrivance 
was applied about 15 months 
ago, with the standard of 
the Royal Society and also 
with two Barometers which 
have been recently completed 
by Mr Newman for Professor 
Schumacher and both of which 
have been furnished with 
the guard. The particulars 
of these comparisons I shall
